title: League client crashed. I entered the game during /remake
body: the League client crashed, but I didn't know it did because it was still loading nor did I receive a pop-up notice, so I thought nothing of it until I thought "this is taking too long". I brought up task manager and closed the program, but when I finally entered the game the team was voting on /remake. I pressed no on the surrender vote with at least 25 more seconds on the vote count. I was moving around but the game still ended and I got penalized for it.

replies.body:
Since you're seeing such a long time to connect to games, it's likely you're experiencing a poor connection to the server. [Our connection troubleshooting guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) goes over the most common solutions to this problem.

Let me know if those steps helped.
